snippet: Health officials are confident that the disease spread from one of five cooling towers that have tested positive for Legionella bacteria.
abstract: Health officials continue to try to pinpoint origin of outbreak of Legionnaires' disease in South Bronx; four of 71 people stricken with disease have died.
lead_paragraph: Health officials are confident that the disease spread from one of five cooling towers that have tested positive for Legionella bacteria.

headline.main: Officials Seek Source of Legionnaires’ Outbreak in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Officials Seek Source of Legionnaires’ Outbreak in the Bronx
